module.name: module-error-handler-plugin
module.doc:description: This module provides common error handling for APIs

parameter.name: badRequestError
parameter.defaultValue: There was an issue with your request

parameter.name: unauthorizedError
parameter.defaultValue: Authentication was not provided or is invalid

parameter.name: forbiddenError
parameter.defaultValue: You are not allowed to make this request

parameter.name: methodNotAllowedError
parameter.defaultValue: The method is not allowed on the resource

parameter.name: notAcceptableError
parameter.defaultValue: The API cannot provide the requested accepted response

parameter.name: timeoutError
parameter.defaultValue: The request to the server has been timed-out

parameter.name: tooManyRequestsError
parameter.defaultValue: You have made too many requests to the server

parameter.name: expressionError
parameter.defaultValue: Error with data transformation. See log for details.

parameter.name: notImplementedError
parameter.defaultValue: The operation has not been implemented

mule:logger.message: #[output aplication/java --- "Error type: " ++ (vars.errorType default "") ++ " Error Description: " ++ (vars.error.description default "")]
#[output application/java --- "Error HTTP Status: " ++ attributes.httpStatus default "" ++ " Error Response: " ++ write(payload, "application/json") default ""]
